snippet: Facebook’s stock rose even though 800 million shares became eligible for trading, the third and largest of a series of lockups that have expired since the company made its debut on the public market.
abstract: Facebook’s stock rose even though 800 million shares became eligible for trading, the third and largest of a series of lockups that have expired since the company made its debut on the public market.

headline.main: Facebook Gains Even as More Shares Become Available
headline.print_headline: Facebook Gains Even as More Shares Become Available
